channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Simple Photoswipe
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Simple Photoswipe

item.title: CVE-2024-5570|2024-06-28T06:00:03.518Z -- unknown -- simple%20photoswipe
item.description: The Simple Photoswipe WordPress plugin through 0.1 does not have authorisation check when updating its settings, which could allow any authenticated users, such as subscriber to update them

item.title: CVE-2024-5473|2024-06-26T06:00:05.192Z -- unknown -- simple%20photoswipe
item.description: The Simple Photoswipe WordPress plugin through 0.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).

item.title: CVE-2024-5473|2024-06-26T14:20:45.424Z -- unknown -- simple%20photoswipe
item.description: The Simple Photoswipe WordPress plugin through 0.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
